title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery       Introduction Learn more about the Mississippi National River and Recreation Area by browsing through our photography galleries. We can also recommend places to go within the park that are particularly good for certain types of photography. See our suggestions as to locations, topics, and ideas.                  Wildlife of the Mississippi River   14 Photos  Explore the great diversity of wildlife that make the Mississippi National River and Recreation Area their home, either year-round or seasonally.           Landscapes of the Mississippi River   12 Photos  This photo gallery depicts the complex landscapes of the Mississippi River within the Mississippi National River and Recreation Area.          Urban Wilderness Canoe Adventure   6 Photos  The Urban Wilderness Canoe Adventure is a progam to get kids on to the Mississippi River. Most trips take place between the U of MN Campus and downtown St. Paul.            Ice Fishing   6 Photos  Winter can be long and hard in Minnesota, but we embrace the cold and have fun. Several ice fishing programs are held each winter.
